name: Among Spaz
description:
[What Is Among Spaz?]

Among Spaz is basically Among Us clone but it's in 3D and contains a bunch of interesting tasks that you'll be available to complete, memes about Spazmatism and a lot of other things.

[Why Is It Named Among Spaz?]

This game is created for YouTuber Spazmatism and for his discord server members. When you are not connected to Spazmatism's discord server click here! Or if you want to check out Spazmatism's youtube channel click here.

[When Will Be Among Spaz Released?] 

Well, good question. I don't actually know and I don't want to set some deadline because I have a lot of other things to do in my private life. But when Among Spaz will be ready to release then I'll release it as soon as possible.

[Who Helped With Among Spaz Development?]

Huge thanks to mic kon for testing Among Spaz from the pure start. Don't forget to check out his channel too!

And again huge thanks to every Spazmatism's discord server member who helped me with a bunch of good ideas to add into the game.
